General.Name: Jaya Real Property Tbk
General.Description: PT Jaya Real Property, Tbk., together with its subsidiaries, operates as a property investment, development, and management company in Indonesia. The company operates through Sale of Land and Buildings, and Rental and Other Services segments. The Sale of Land and Buildings segment engages in the real estate and urban development activities; and release/purchase, processing, maturation, and development of facilities and infrastructure. The Rental and Other Services segment is involved in leasing of shopping centers, hotels, icerink, water parks, and areas of the city; and water management business. The company provides general trading and construction, building management, and transportation services, as well as operates hotels. The company was founded in 1979 and is based in Tangerang, Indonesia. PT Jaya Real Property, Tbk. is a subsidiary of PT Pembangunan Jaya.
General.Address: CBD Emerald Block CE/A No. 1, Tangerang, Indonesia, 15227
